arguments.description: An expression that can be evaluated as a Boolean.
arguments.name: condition

arguments.description: Expression to evaluate and return if condition is true.
arguments.name: string_expression1

arguments.description: Expression to evaluate and return if condition is false.
arguments.name: string_expression2

description:
Evaluates a Boolean conditional dynamic expression. Depending
        on whether the expression is true or false, dynamically
        evaluates one of two string expressions and returns the result.
name: iif
